archdesc.scopecontent: "The song "Pink Shoelaces" was first released as a single in November, 1959. Written as a single by Micki Grant, it was originally sung by Dodie Stevens who made it an instant hit and the best-selling record of the year. As the teenage world bebopped to its unforgettable sound, "Pink Shoelaces" not only became the fashion fad of the day but ranked in sales to the tune of 2¹/₂ million copies."--Back of container.
